sentence.Network_en: Because Buddha and Jesus emphasise effort and Chuang Tzu emphasises effortlessness.
sentence.Network_cn: 因为佛陀与耶稣主张有为,而庄子强调的是无为.

sentence.Network_en: Such effortlessness is achieved only after hours of practice.
sentence.Network_cn: 如此轻松的任务只要几小时就完成了.

PerfectNetExp.abs: ...ndalini。应当这样， 像这样，手这样放平。 毫不费力（effortlessness）是关键词，绝对地毫不费力。无论你是在我面前，还是我的 …

list.abs: his most effortless performance ever and it's the most difficult stuff to do .他有史以来最出色的性能，它是最困难的事情要做。
Movement and Carriage An effortless graceful movement demonstrating endurance while covering ground efficiently ., 轻松优美的动作 , 显示出耐力和有效的步伐.
the wrinkled forehead , tightly curled tail and swift , effortless gait ( resembling a racehorse trotting full out ) are typical of the breed .这个品种的典型特征是：前额有皱纹，尾巴紧紧卷曲，敏捷、轻松的步态（象赛马在全速奔跑)。
Lenny swooped Tom up in one swift , gentle , effortless motion .尼敏捷、温柔、不费力地扶起汤姆。

means.word_mean: 1. the quality of requiring little effort;

sentences.sentence: "such effortlessness is achieved only after hours of practice"

auth_sentence.content: Most ballet dancers aim for a look of effortlessness.
